tool_description:
Rugby live score service at RugbyApi has all the live scores, results, fixtures, statistics and league tables from the major rugby union leagues like England Aviva Premiership, Australia National Rugby League - NRL, Wales rugby league and France TOP 14.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
name: RugbyAPI2
title: RugbyAPI2

api_list.name: TVCountries
api_list.description: Get a list of countries and their respective TV channels broadcasting a specific Football match.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the match you want to retrieve the TV countries for.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rugbyapi2.p.rapidapi.com/api/tv/country/all/event/10974920"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugbyapi2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rugbyapi2.p.rapidapi.com/api/tv/country/all/event/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugbyapi2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: MatchTvChannelDetails
api_list.description: Get the details of a specific TV channel broadcasting a specific Football match.

required_parameters.name: channId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the channel you want to retrieve the details for.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the match you want to retrieve the channel details for.

print(response.json())

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: PlayerNearMatches
api_list.description: Get near matches for a specific Rugby player.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the player for which to retrieve the near matches. This can be obtained from lineups, best players, or team players.

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugbyapi2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
